items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by any team member, all other members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task updates are synchronized across web and mobile platforms without requiring a manual refresh.
non_functional: System latency for updates must be under 2 seconds
Support for at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation

items.title: Shared Task Boards
items.description: Provide a shared visual board where team members can create, assign, and track tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create new boards and invite team members.
Tasks can be dragged and dropped between columns representing different statuses.
non_functional: Support for at least 500 tasks per board without UI lag

notes: User requirement was high-level; assumed core collaboration features include real-time updates and shared boards. Additional features like chat, notifications, and file sharing may be considered in future iterations.
